channel.title: Cheddr - Five Times the Stars [Album, Synthwave, Electro Rock, Synth House]
channel.description:
Listen to the whole album here https://cheddr.bandcamp.com/album/five-times-the-stars Individual Tracks are also below
No kidding released about 3 weeks before the Retrofit soundpack came out.
Synthy house, ambient electonic, electro rock, retro synthwave music. I'm really proud of this - it was about 6 months in the making. Would be thrilled if some of my Auxy friends picked up the album and left a review.
Cheddr returns with a synthwave, sci-fi, and cyberpunk inspired album with melodic synths and keys with modern beats and spacey ambient riffs.
Track include the electro-rock styled Massive Dark Corona, From Up Above and Colony, synthy house styled Spirit of 2076, Extravehicular, and Orbit and Engage. Tonight's the Night and Acid Clouds have complex acid basslines and show off a variety of influences and a blending of genre's. Wicked glow is simply an ambient Synthwave anthem.
This is the culmination of a three album set on a theme of human trajectory, optimism, and adaptability, from the piano driven beats of Three Sheets to the Wind, to the swirling symphonic ambient and bold beats in For the Skies. Five Times the stars firmly roots the quirky electronic sounds that punctuated the previous two albums in the retro-future where they comfortably belong.
Tracks: http://cheddr.bandcamp.com/track/massive-dark-corona http://cheddr.bandcamp.com/track/spirit-of-2076 http://cheddr.bandcamp.com/track/from-up-above http://cheddr.bandcamp.com/track/wicked-glow http://cheddr.bandcamp.com/track/acid-clouds-with-what-hope-is-left http://cheddr.bandcamp.com/track/tonights-the-night http://cheddr.bandcamp.com/track/colony-2 http://cheddr.bandcamp.com/track/extravehicular-its-alright-out-here http://cheddr.bandcamp.com/track/orbit-and-engage http://cheddr.bandcamp.com/track/up-above-jamout http://cheddr.bandcamp.com/track/bonus-colony-extended
Also two of these tracks are going to be featured on this radio show on Oct 17th. Check it out. https://www.facebook.com/CheddrMusic/posts/925951294271078

item.title: Cheddr - Five Times the Stars [Album, Synthwave, Electro Rock, Synth House]

item.description:
Listen to the whole album here

Individual Tracks are also below

No kidding released about 3 weeks before the Retrofit soundpack came out.

Synthy house, ambient electonic, electro rock, retro synthwave music.
I’m really proud of this - it was about 6 months in the making.
Would be thrilled if some of my Auxy friends picked up the album and left a review.

Cheddr returns with a synthwave, sci-fi, and cyberpunk inspired album with melodic synths and keys with modern beats and spacey ambient riffs.

Track include the electro-rock styled Massive Dark Corona, From Up Above and Colony, synthy house styled Spirit of 2076, Extravehicular, and Orbit and Engage. Tonight’s the Night and Acid Clouds have complex acid basslines and show off a variety of influences and a blending of genre’s. Wicked glow is simply an ambient Synthwave anthem.

This is the culmination of a three album set on a theme of human trajectory, optimism, and adaptability, from the piano driven beats of Three Sheets to the Wind, to the swirling symphonic ambient and bold beats in For the Skies. Five Times the stars firmly roots the quirky electronic sounds that punctuated the previous two albums in the retro-future where they comfortably belong.
